mapper.sql:
SELECT (@i:=@i+1) AS index_id, T.CID, T.CNAME, T.ONCE, T.COURSE_TIME, T.WEEK_FREQUENCY, T.TOTAL_TIME, T.COST, T.CLASS_PEOPLE, T.REMARK FROM COURSE T,(SELECT @i:=0) AS init WHERE 1=1
AND T.NAME LIKE '%${params.name}%'
order by T.cname
mapper.select: select c1.cid from course c1 where c1.cname like concat ('%',#{cname},'%')
